trends: There have been no other sightings in Johnstown
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Cigar-shaped object silently flew across the sky. It had no wings. Shiny, with a dark "band" across the middle.
divs: Sighting DetailsWhile outside taking the dog to the bathroom, I looked up and saw a very very small object moving across the sky. I thought it was a plane at first, and for some reason kept watching it because it left no jet trail and I heard nothing. It got closer and lower and eventually I could see that it was cigar-shaped. I thought that it was 2 capsule-shaped objects which appeared to be attached, flying end-to-end. It was high enough to be going through the wispy clouds overhead. It maintained an even, yet brisk speed. I could see clearly that there were NO WINGS -- that was what really amazed me. It was very odd. It eventually went out of my view because of the houses next door. It was shiny and light-colored, silver. I immediately came in and put it on Facebook and Tumblr because it was so perplexing --
